languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт хранит молчание, обдумывая ваши слова.{/n} "В глубине души я всегда знала — за защитными куполами Крудараха я не чувствую себя поистине живой и свободной. И потому оттягивала момент, когда нужно было возвращаться. Если бы я вернулась... Нет, если бы сразу пошла иным Путем, то я могла бы спасти тех, кто пережил бедствие!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт хранит молчание, обдумывая ваши слова. .{/n} "В глубине души я всегда знала — за защитными куполами Крудараха я не чувствую себя поистине живой и свободной. И потому оттягивала момент, когда нужно было возвращаться. Если бы я вернулась... Нет, если бы сразу пошла иным Путем, то я могла бы спасти тех, кто пережил бедствие!"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet keeps her silence as she ponders your words.{/n} "Deep in my heart, I always knew I would not feel truly alive or free behind Crudarach's protective domes. That was why I kept putting off my return. If I had returned... no, if I had chosen a different Path to begin with, I could have saved those who survived the disaster!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт хранит молчание, обдумывая ваши слова.{/n} "В глубине души я всегда знала — за защитными куполами Крудараха я не чувствую себя поистине живой и свободной. И потому оттягивала момент, когда нужно было возвращаться. Если бы я вернулась... Нет, если бы сразу пошла иным Путем, то я могла бы спасти тех, кто пережил бедствие!"

That was why I kept putting off my return. If I had returned... no, if I had chosen a different Path to begin with, I could have saved those who survived the disaster!"

That was why I kept putting off my return. If I had returned... no, if I had chosen a different Path to begin with, I could have saved those who survived the disaster!"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet guarda silencio mientras sopesa tus palabras.{/n} «En el fondo de mi corazón, siempre supe que no me sentiría verdaderamente viva ni libre tras las cúpulas protectoras de Crudarach. Por eso no dejaba de postergar mi retorno. ¡De haber regresado... no, de haber escogido una senda diferente, podría haber salvado a los supervivientes de la catástrofe!».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet keeps her silence as she ponders your words.{/n} "Deep in my heart, I always knew I would not feel truly alive or free behind Crudarach's protective domes. That was why I kept putting off my return. If I had returned... no, if I had chosen a different Path to begin with, I could have saved those who survived the disaster!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet guarda silencio mientras sopesa tus palabras.{/n} «En el fondo de mi corazón, siempre supe que no me sentiría verdaderamente viva ni libre tras las cúpulas protectoras de Crudarach. Por eso no dejaba de postergar mi retorno. ¡De haber regresado... no, de haber escogido una senda diferente, podría haber salvado a los supervivientes de la catástrofe!».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは押し黙り、あなたの言葉に深く考え込んでいる。 {/n}「クルダラの守護ドームの向こうでは、生きている実感も自由もないと心の奥底でいつも思っていた。だから帰ることを先延ばしにしていたのだ。もし私が戻っていたら…いや、そもそも別の道を選んでいたら、あの災害を生き延びた人々を救えたかもしれない！」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet keeps her silence as she ponders your words.{/n} "Deep in my heart, I always knew I would not feel truly alive or free behind Crudarach's protective domes. That was why I kept putting off my return. If I had returned... no, if I had chosen a different Path to begin with, I could have saved those who survived the disaster!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは押し黙り、あなたの言葉に深く考え込んでいる。 {/n}「クルダラの守護ドームの向こうでは、生きている実感も自由もないと心の奥底でいつも思っていた。だから帰ることを先延ばしにしていたのだ。もし私が戻っていたら…いや、そもそも別の道を選んでいたら、あの災害を生き延びた人々を救えたかもしれない！」

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默了，思考着你的话。{/n}“在我内心深处，我一直都很清楚，在克鲁达拉赫的庇护之下，我永远都无法感受到真正的生命与自由，这就是我迟迟不愿回去的原因。可如果我当时回去了……不，如果我当初就选择了别的道途，我说不定可以拯救那场灾难中的人们！”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet keeps her silence as she ponders your words.{/n} "Deep in my heart, I always knew I would not feel truly alive or free behind Crudarach's protective domes. That was why I kept putting off my return. If I had returned... no, if I had chosen a different Path to begin with, I could have saved those who survived the disaster!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默了，思考着你的话。{/n}“在我内心深处，我一直都很清楚，在克鲁达拉赫的庇护之下，我永远都无法感受到真正的生命与自由，这就是我迟迟不愿回去的原因。可如果我当时回去了……不，如果我当初就选择了别的道途，我说不定可以拯救那场灾难中的人们！”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet reste silencieuse tandis qu'elle pèse ses mots.{/n} « Au plus profond de mon cœur, j'ai toujours su que je ne me sentirais jamais véritablement vivante ou libre sous les dômes de protection de Crudarach. C'est pour cela que je ne cessais de reporter mon retour. Si j'y étais retournée... Non, si j'avais choisi une Voie différente dès le départ, j'aurais pu sauver tous ceux qui avaient survécu au désastre ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet keeps her silence as she ponders your words.{/n} "Deep in my heart, I always knew I would not feel truly alive or free behind Crudarach's protective domes. That was why I kept putting off my return. If I had returned... no, if I had chosen a different Path to begin with, I could have saved those who survived the disaster!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet reste silencieuse tandis qu'elle pèse ses mots.{/n} « Au plus profond de mon cœur, j'ai toujours su que je ne me sentirais jamais véritablement vivante ou libre sous les dômes de protection de Crudarach. C'est pour cela que je ne cessais de reporter mon retour. Si j'y étais retournée... Non, si j'avais choisi une Voie différente dès le départ, j'aurais pu sauver tous ceux qui avaient survécu au désastre ! »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schweigt, während sie über deine Worte nachdenkt.{/n} "Tief im Herzen war mir immer klar, dass ich mich hinter Crudarachs Schutzkuppeln niemals wirklich lebendig oder frei fühlen würde. Darum verschob ich meine Rückkehr wieder und wieder. Wenn ich zurückgekehrt wäre ... nein, hätte ich von Anbeginn an einen völlig anderen Pfad gewählt, hätte ich die Überlebenden der Katastrophe retten können!"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet keeps her silence as she ponders your words.{/n} "Deep in my heart, I always knew I would not feel truly alive or free behind Crudarach's protective domes. That was why I kept putting off my return. If I had returned... no, if I had chosen a different Path to begin with, I could have saved those who survived the disaster!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schweigt, während sie über deine Worte nachdenkt.{/n} "Tief im Herzen war mir immer klar, dass ich mich hinter Crudarachs Schutzkuppeln niemals wirklich lebendig oder frei fühlen würde. Darum verschob ich meine Rückkehr wieder und wieder. Wenn ich zurückgekehrt wäre ... nein, hätte ich von Anbeginn an einen völlig anderen Pfad gewählt, hätte ich die Überlebenden der Katastrophe retten können!"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, sözlerini ölçüp tartarken sükûnetini koruyor.{/n} "Kalbimin derinlerinde gizlesem de Crudarach'ın koruyucu kubbelerinin ardında gerçekten hayatta ya da özgür olduğumu hissetmeyeceğimin hep farkındaydım. Bu nedenle geri dönmemi erteleyip durdum. Geri dönseydim... Hayır, en başta farklı bir Yol seçseydim felaketten sağ kalanları kurtarabilirdim!"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet keeps her silence as she ponders your words.{/n} "Deep in my heart, I always knew I would not feel truly alive or free behind Crudarach's protective domes. That was why I kept putting off my return. If I had returned... no, if I had chosen a different Path to begin with, I could have saved those who survived the disaster!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, sözlerini ölçüp tartarken sükûnetini koruyor.{/n} "Kalbimin derinlerinde gizlesem de Crudarach'ın koruyucu kubbelerinin ardında gerçekten hayatta ya da özgür olduğumu hissetmeyeceğimin hep farkındaydım. Bu nedenle geri dönmemi erteleyip durdum. Geri dönseydim... Hayır, en başta farklı bir Yol seçseydim felaketten sağ kalanları kurtarabilirdim!"
